52086.「ふむ。いきなりは 恥ずかしいものですな。\n 私は いつでも 冒険者のご協力を:
Hmm. It's a little embarrassing to come out of
the blue, isn't it? I am always open to the
cooperation of adventurers. Please come again.
<end>

52088.「……おお。\n 新たに 討伐数が <%nM_qualify>匹に達した\n モ:
Oh...oh. Looks like there is a new monster
that has reached <%dM_qualify>!

52089.「……ふむふむ。新たに 討伐数が目標数に達した\n モンスターは いないようです:
Hmmm...hmmm. It seems that no new monsters have reached the target number of kills. Monsters that have reached the target number
of defeated monsters will be marked with a medal in the monster list. If you see a monster with a medal, please come and see it.
Monsters who have already received medals will be marked with a crown. So far, you have received <%dM_value100> for killing 100
monsters, <%dM_value200> for killing 200 monsters, <%dM_value300> for killing 300 monsters, <%dM_value400> for killing 400
monsters, <%dM_value500> for killing 500 monsters, and <%dM_value500> for killing 600 monsters. <%dM_value600> for killing 600
monsters, <%dM_value700> for killing 700 monsters, <%dM_value800> for killing 800 monsters, <%dM_value900> for killing 900
monsters, <%dM_value1000> for killing 1000 monsters. The type of monsters killed so far will be <%dM_m_record> species and the medal
will be <%dM_valuetype>.

52091.「おお！ <pc>殿！\n みごと すべてのモンスターの\n <%nM_qual:
Oh! ! We have successfully killed all the monsters! If you've cooperated with us this far, we can proceed with the
elimination on our own. We would like to thank you for your cooperation so far. There may come a day in the future when we will need to
request something from you adventurers. If that is the case, please accept it graciously. Then, please continue your journey.

52092.「<pc>殿のおかげで\n あとは 我々だけで 討伐を進められます。\n これま:
Thanks to , we are now on our own to take down the rest. Thank you for your cooperation so far. There may come a day in
the future when we will request something from you adventurers. If so, please accept our request with all my heart. Then, please
continue your journey.

52093.「ちいさなメダルを もらえる状態の\n モンスターは 討伐モンスターリストの\n:
Monsters with Mini Medals will be marked with a medal in the monster list. If you find a monster with a medal, please come back again.
Monsters who have already received a medal will be marked with a crown. The medals you have received so far are <%dM_value100> for
killing 100 monsters, <%dM_value200> for killing 200 monsters, <%dM_value300> for killing 300 monsters, <%dM_value400> for
killing 400 monsters, <%dM_value500> for killing 500 monsters, and <%dM_value500> for killing 600 monsters. <%dM_value600> for
killing 600 monsters, <%dM_value700> for killing 700 monsters, <%dM_value800> for killing 800 monsters, <%dM_value900> for
killing 900 monsters, <%dM_value1000> for killing 1000 monsters. The type of monsters killed so far will be <%dM_m_record> species
and the medal will be <%dM_valuetype>.

52094.「冒険者の方 こんにちは！\n 私は 各国連合モンスター討伐隊\n 隊長の ウェ:
Hello adventurers! My name is Werner, captain of the Monster Strike Force, a coalition of nations! Our strike force is a special
organization specially appointed by the nations of the world to defeat the monsters that have become active due to the outbreak of
demon miasma. We are dispatching soldiers to dangerous areas around the world, but we need the cooperation of all adventurers to fill the
shortage of soldiers. The number of monsters you have killed is listed on the monster list in the Records. We will check the list and
give you a Mini Medal for every 100 monsters up to a maximum of 1,000 monsters killed. Some monsters will not be included in the list.
Please check the indentation to the left of the monster's name on the monster list to see if you are eligible. In order to promote
further defeats, an additional 50 Mini Medal will be awarded for every 100 monster types defeated. Your name is...hmmm. .
Now then, may I see your Records to confirm the results of the battle?

52096.「私は いつでも 冒険者のご協力を\n お待ちしております。またお越しください。:
I am always open to the assistance of
adventurers. Please come again.
<end>

52097.「<pc>殿 こんにちは！\n 我が討伐隊では 多くのモンスターを倒した\n 冒:
Hello! In our strike force, we give Mini Medals to adventurers who have killed many monsters. Now, let's start with
the records to check the results of the battle.

52098.「以上！ 合計で <%nM_value>枚分になります！\n 冒険者の ご協力に:
Above! The total is for <%dM_value>! Thank you
for your cooperation, adventurers! This is the
promised reward!

59322.「<pc>殿 こんにちは！\n 最近 魔瘴の活発化が さらに進行し\n モンスタ:
Hello! Recently, demon miasma has become more and more active and the number of monsters has been increasing. So, in
addition to the 100 monsters we have killed so far, we have decided to ask all adventurers to join us in killing 600 monsters, and if you
report back to us after killing 600 monsters, we will give you a Mini Medal from the strike force, just as we did for killing 100
monsters. Now, let's get started.

59330.「……おお。\n 新たに 討伐数が目標数に達した\n モンスターが いるようです:
Oh... It seems that some monsters have reached
the target number of monsters to be killed!

72247.「<pc>殿！\n 超大型モンスターの襲来によって\n ガケっぷち村が壊滅した件:
! Have you heard about the super monster attack that destroyed Ruined Village? We, the strike force, have decided to further
strengthen our monster hunting efforts to combat the crisis, and we have decided to ask all adventurers to help us take down 700
monsters! From now on, we will grant you a Mini Medal for every 100 monsters you kill, up to a maximum of 700! Now, let's get started.
Can I see the records to confirm the results of the battle?

82139.「<pc>殿 こんにちは！\n グランドタイタス号が 出港されましたが\n レン:
Hello! The Grand Titus has sailed, have you been to Lendersia? We, the strike force, are planning to go to Lendersia
to survey the continent, but due to the many damages from monsters, we are not going to survey the continent. We would like to discuss
this with you! We would like to ask all adventurers to further strengthen our efforts to kill 700 monsters. From now on, we will
grant you one Mini Medal for every 100 monsters up to a maximum of 700 monsters killed, from our strike force! Now, let's get
started. Can I see the records to confirm the results of the battle?

90576.「こんにちは <pc>殿！\n 以前 お話した レンダーシアの調査ですが\n ま:
Hello ! The survey of Lendersia that I mentioned before will be ready soon. However, we have so many people working on the
survey that we can't get around to killing the monsters. So, I have a request. We are currently asking for 800 monsters to be
killed, but I would like to ask to further strengthen the request and take down 1000 monsters. From now on, we will pay
one Mini Medal for every 100 animals up to a maximum of 1,000 killed by our strike force! In addition, in order to further promote the
killing of monsters, we will give out an additional 50 Mini Medal for every 100 monsters we kill. Now, let's start right away.

122527.「……おお。\n どうやら 倒したモンスターの種類が\n 目標数に達しているよう:
...Oh. Looks like we've reached our target
number of defeated monsters!

122528.「……おお。\n 新たに 討伐数が目標数に達した\n モンスターが いるようです:
Oh... It seems that some monsters have reached
the target number of monsters to be killed!
